trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: You create a handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event when you want to customize how the user's credentials are authenticated at run time.
trans-unit.target: Du oppretter et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>-hendelse når du ønsker å tilpasse hvordan godkjennes brukerens legitimasjon ved kjøretid.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticatingEventArgs class supplies values to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AuthenticatingEventArgs leverer verdier noen <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: By using the properties available in this class, you can retrieve the user credentials to customize authentication.
trans-unit.target: Du kan hente brukerlegitimasjonen for å tilpasse godkjenning ved hjelp av egenskaper som er tilgjengelige i denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event before validating the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klasse hever den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>hendelsen før validering av brukerlegitimasjonen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class constructs an instance of the AuthenticatingEventArgs object and passes it to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>bygger en forekomst av AuthenticatingEventArgs-objektet og sendes til noen <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> properties to retrieve the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>og <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>Egenskaper for å hente brukerlegitimasjonen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property can contain additional values that are required for authentication, such as an identification number.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>egenskapen kan inneholde ekstra verdier som er nødvendig for godkjenning, for eksempel en ID-nummer.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>egenskapen angir om brukeropplysningene er gyldige.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to the result of your customized authentication.
trans-unit.target: Du har angitt den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>egenskapen resultatet av egendefinerte godkjenningen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to `true` if you have checked the user credentials and do not want the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class to check user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg må du angi den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>egenskapen `true` Hvis du har kontrollert brukerlegitimasjonen og vil ikke den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen for å se brukerlegitimasjonen via medlemskap standardleverandøren.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukeropplysningene er gyldige.

trans-unit.source: If you authenticate user credentials in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event, set the Authenticated property to indicate whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du godkjenne brukerlegitimasjonen i en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>hendelsen egenskapen godkjent til å angi om brukeropplysningene er gyldige.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: If the user credentials are valid and no additional validation is needed, set Authenticated to `true` and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis brukeropplysningene er gyldige, og ingen ekstra Validering er nødvendig, WantDestinationQueue godkjent `true` og <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>til `true`.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to indicate that the authentication service should bypass the default steps for authenticating a user.
trans-unit.target: Du har angitt den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>egenskap for å angi at godkjenningstjenesten skal hopper over standard trinn for å godkjenne en bruker.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value in Authenticated is used by the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class only if <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien i godkjent brukes av den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen bare hvis <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class calls the default membership provider to validate user credentials, and then overwrites the value in Authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>er `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>kaller medlemskap standardleverandøren for å validere bruker- og overskriver verdien i godkjent.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeropplysningene er gyldige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukerlegitimasjonen som er godkjent.

trans-unit.source: You can set the AuthenticationIsComplete property to indicate whether the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class must authenticate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen AuthenticationIsComplete som viser om den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen må godkjennes brukerlegitimasjonen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If AuthenticationIsComplete is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Hvis AuthenticationIsComplete `true`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>klassen kan ikke valideres brukerlegitimasjonen via medlemskap standardleverandøren.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it uses the value in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to determine whether to create an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: I stedet den bruker verdien i <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>å finne ut om du vil opprette en informasjonskapsel for godkjenning.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If AuthenticationIsComplete is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class validates the user credentials through the default membership provider and overwrites the value in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis AuthenticationIsComplete `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>validerer brukerlegitimasjonen via medlemskap standardleverandøren og overskriver verdien i den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all the steps for validating the user credentials have been performed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis alle trinnene for validering av brukerlegitimasjonen er utført; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets additional user values for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Henter bruker verdier for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: You can use the CustomCredential property to retrieve authentication values other than user name and password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke CustomCredential-egenskapen til å hente godkjenning verdier enn brukernavn og passord under den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: For example, an application might be configured to validate an identification number together with the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Et program kan for eksempel konfigureres for å validere nummeret sammen med brukernavn og passord.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the identification number will be passed in the `CustomCredential` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet ID-nummer blir sendt i den `CustomCredential` -parameteren for den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then retrieve the custom value through the CustomCredential property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel egendefinerte verdien til egenskapen CustomCredential.

trans-unit.source: The CustomCredential property contains the customized values in the same format as they are passed to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CustomCredential inneholder tilpassede verdiene i samme format som de er sendt til den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler, if more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the value of the CustomCredential property to retrieve the values.
trans-unit.target: I de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>hendelsesbehandlingen Hvis mer enn én verdi er lagret i egenskapen, må du analysere verdien for egenskapen CustomCredential for å hente verdiene.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The values required for authentication other than user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene som kreves for godkjenning enn brukernavn og passord.

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter passordet for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: You use the Password property to retrieve the password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker passordegenskapen til passord under den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The password to validate.
trans-unit.target: Passordet til å validere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the authentication name for the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet godkjenning for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: You use the UserName property to retrieve the authentication name during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke UserName-egenskapen til å hente navnet godkjenning under den <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The user name to validate.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavnet for å bekrefte.
